About Me

  I started my programming journey after watching a 3-hour Python course on YouTube. The idea of making a computer do exactly what I want intruiged me. Since then, I've been passionately making games, apps, and scripts. Even though not every project I make is good, it still helps me learn and grow in this programming journey. Along the way, I've explored all kinds of software projects, from customizing Linux to creating virtual assistants. You can click here to see some of my projects.

Interested in contacting me? Hit me up at one of the social profiles above.
